thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan pays surprise visit to Ram Charan on the sets of ‘Bruce Lee’
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan pays surprise visit to Ram Charan on the sets of ‘Bruce Lee’

author: Deccan
title: Shah Rukh Khan pays surprise visit to Ram Charan on the sets of ‘Bruce Lee’
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 15.24 pm Mumbai: Ram Charan who wrapped up shooting for his upcoming film ‘Bruce Lee’ on Monday had a surprise guest on the sets of the film. While the entire unit was busy canning the song at Hyderabad's Ramoji Film City, they were in for a surprise as Shah Rukh Khan walked in. Read: When Shah Rukh Khan and Mahesh Babu met Shah Rukh who is in Hyderabad shooting for ‘Dilwale’ also watched few rushes of the song and was mightily impressed by Ram. The South star couldn’t contain his excitement, posted few pictures and commented, “Superb surprise !! ‪#‎Shahrukhkhan‬!! on last day of ‪#‎BruceleeTheFighter‬ shoot. Girls on the sets went crazy.He saw parts of Brucelee title song and loved it !!” Shah Rukh, who has been very humble in his approach to meet his celebrity fans, recently went on a tête-à-tête with badminton champ Saina Nehwal. He also met Mahesh Babu on the sets of ‘Brahmotsavam’.
